short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension displays d-day with a background image fetched from NASA whenever a new tab is opened.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Whenever you open a new tab, you'll see your d-day with nice background images from NASA's APOD(https://apod.nasa.gov/apod/astropix.html).
